MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH34, EH35 & EH36 postcode areas of Tranent & Humbie. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 04:53am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of severe weather conditions and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 06:53am on the 4th of December 2020.
